data.title: International Congress on Engineering — Engineering for Evolution
data.text:
This conference contains selected papers from the International Congress on Engineering — Engineering for Evolution, held in Covilhã, Portugal, on the 27th-29th November 2019. The conference was hosted by the Faculty of Engineering, University of Beira Interior.

The collection contains 73 peer-reviewed papers addressing various key themes and issues in the fields of engineering.

Topics include: Aeronautics and Astronautics, Architecture, Informatics, Civil Engineering, and Electrotechnical and Mechanical Engineerings.

These papers will of interest to academics, students, and professionals researching or working on different fields of engineering.
